result.execSummary:
The defendant Darius A Brown was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Darius A Brown is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Darius A Brown was found guilty of Intimidate Victim/Use or Attempt Force [Modifiers: Party to a Crime], a class G felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.45(1).
  • Darius A Brown was found guilty of Theft-Movable Property <=$2500 [Modifiers: Penalty-Theft if Value <=$2500, Party to a Crime], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: If probation is revoked or will discharge with outstanding financial obligations due, a civil judgment shall be entered for the balance due.

Not to be armed.  Must get GED/or equivalent.  Maintain full time work, or school, or treatment.  Must undergo anger management counseling per agent.  No contact with co0 defendants, Guy Mountain or Mark Girton.  No contact with victim Jerry Smolinski or Top Hat Motel.  Costs on Ct. 6 are to be paid within the 1st year of probation.  Ct. 7 costs are to be paid within the first 2 years of probation.  6 month periodic review.

filed by atty Klopp
adding Cts. 6 & 7.

11:12 Defendant Darius A Brown in court, in custody with attorney Roger L. Klopp.  Christine M. Genda appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Sentencing recommendations given by counsel.  Rights/Elements.  Defendant plead no contest to Cts. 6 & 7 of amended information.  Court found guilty.  Judgment was entered.  Ct. 5 dismissed.  On Ct. 6 Court withheld sentencing placed defendant on probation for 5 years.  $518.00 costs. Submit DNA sample.  Ct. 7 Court withheld sentencing placed defendant on probation for 1 year, concurrent to Ct. 6.  $443.00 costs.  Conditions of probation on each count are as follows:  Not to be armed, must get GED/or equivalent, maintain full time work, school, or treatment,  undergo anger management per agent.  No contact with co-defendants M.G. or G.M.  No contact with victim J.S. or Top Hat Motel.  Ct. 7 will have 167 days of credit.  If the co-defendants go to jury trial, defendant will be giving testimony, as per agreement for this sentence.  Costs on Ct. 7 are to be paid within the first year, costs for Ct. 6 are to be paid within the first two years. 6 month periodic review.  11:55.
